report.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
report.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

report.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
report.help: Frames must have an accessible name

report.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
report.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

report.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
report.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

report.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
report.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

report.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
report.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

context.description: Live news, investigations, opinion, photos and video by the journalists of The New York Times from more than 150 countries around the world. Subscribe for coverage of U.S. and international news, politics, business, technology, science, health, arts, sports and more.
context.title: The New York Times - Breaking News, US News, World News and Videos
